expanded.md.question: Are all jurisdictions of qualification valid and properly maintained?
Are equity issuances and transfers compliant with securities laws?
Are restrictive agreements over shares enforceable and disclosed?
Are officer/director biographical disclosures consistent with filings?
Are all historical names and addresses of the company/subsidiaries documented?
Do management letters from auditors indicate recurring issues?
Are changes in accounting policies clearly disclosed and justified?
Are equity valuations consistent with financing rounds and 409A reports?
Do aging schedules reveal collectability risks in accounts receivable?
Are margins and ASPs consistent across product lines and reporting periods?
Do consents and agreements with tax authorities impose future obligations?
Are tax shelters or structured transactions disclosed and compliant?
Are there material real estate tax liabilities outstanding?
Have IRS Form 3115 filings or method changes been reviewed and approved?
Are pending/threatened disputes likely to affect closing timing or valuation?
Are indentures or security agreements enforceable and complete?
Do insider debt arrangements comply with governance requirements?
Are outstanding letters of credit or bonds fully disclosed?
Do mortgages or liens restrict asset transfers in an acquisition?
Has lender correspondence identified risk of default or acceleration?
Are leases or subleases subject to landlord consent on change of control?
Are title insurance policies up to date and covering all real property?
Are property surveys consistent with company records?
Do appraisals reflect fair market value in line with balance sheet?
Are warranty claims or guaranties enforceable with suppliers?
Are IP registrations renewed on time and free of defects?
Are royalty obligations material compared to total revenue?
Are IP ownership chains for acquisitions and spin-offs clean?
Do internet domains align with brand and trademark strategy?
Are IP policies enforced for trade secret protection and employee exits?
Are brokers', finders', or advisory fee agreements fully disclosed?
Do affiliate agreements involve tax, indemnity, or lease arrangements?
Are claims experience and loss histories consistent with insurance disclosures?
Do planned JVs or alliances impact integration risk?
Are trade association memberships material to regulatory exposure?
Are supplier agreements assignable without penalties?
Do sales and distribution agreements comply with antitrust rules?
Are forecasts and marketing plans aligned with internal budgets?
Are advertising agreements consistent with brand/IP protections?
Are competitor benchmarking reports used in decision-making?
Are there regulatory agency investigations disclosed beyond litigation matters?
Are settlement documents complete and fully executed?
Have waivers or releases been granted in prior disputes?
Are there patterns of litigation with customers or suppliers?
Are disclosure controls for litigation consistent with auditor requirements?
Are copies of approvals and consents complete and available?
Are there unresolved violations or deficiency notices?
Is correspondence with regulators properly documented?
Do regulators require consents or filings before change of control?
Are minutes from regulatory meetings consistent with compliance policies?
Are service, pay, and tenure records complete for all employees/contractors?
Do consultant agreements include valid non-compete/confidentiality clauses?
Are benefit plans accompanied by actuarial and IRS determinations?
Are collective bargaining agreements current and disputes documented?
Are harassment/misconduct investigations tracked and closed properly?
Are breach response plans tested regularly and updated?
Do security audit reports show remediation of identified weaknesses?
Are privacy/security officers formally appointed and resourced?
Are cookie/tracking disclosures compliant with regional laws?
Are background checks documented for sensitive data handlers?
Are hazardous substance lists complete and tracked against regulations?
Are biodiversity, energy, and climate impact studies disclosed?
Are workplace safety investigations documented with corrective actions?
Are diversity and inclusion metrics tied to workforce planning?
Are whistleblower protections and reporting mechanisms active and monitored?

due diligence.md.question: Do incorporation documents, bylaws, and amendments reflect the current structure?
Are board/shareholder minutes complete and authorizing all key actions?
Does the organizational chart align with subsidiaries, affiliates, and management roles?
Are shareholder agreements, voting trusts, or restrictions enforceable and disclosed?
Are indemnification agreements and D&O protections consistent with market practice?
Do audited and unaudited financials reconcile with management reporting?
Have auditors identified deficiencies in controls or governance?
Are there liabilities or commitments excluded from financial statements?
Are forecasts and budgets based on defensible assumptions?
Are revenue recognition and accounting policies consistently applied?
Are all tax returns filed and payments current across jurisdictions?
Are there ongoing audits, assessments, or material disputes?
Do tax sharing or intercompany agreements create post-closing obligations?
Are uncertain tax positions (ASC 740) adequately disclosed/reserved?
Have prior acquisitions created contingent or unindemnified tax exposures?
What debt instruments, credit facilities, or bonds are outstanding and compliant?
Are there guarantees, insider loans, or related-party financings?
Are liens or encumbrances recorded on company assets?
Have lenders issued waivers or identified covenant breaches?
Do compliance reports or certificates indicate defaults?
Are titles, deeds, and leases valid, assignable, and unrestricted?
Are equipment and inventory schedules accurate vs. insurance/depreciation records?
Do appraisals or valuations reveal impairments or risks?
Are warranties/service contracts current and transferrable?
Are environmental or zoning issues tied to property?
Is there a complete and current IP register (patents, trademarks, copyrights, domains)?
Do license agreements impose royalties or restrictions impacting value?
Are trade secrets and confidential know-how adequately protected?
Are there pending/threatened infringement or opposition claims?
Do employee/contractor agreements assign IP rights fully to the company?
Do top customer/supplier agreements contain change-of-control clauses?
Are government or regulated contracts subject to special restrictions?
Are JV/partnership/alliance agreements material to operations?
Are insurance policies adequate with no pending cancellations?
Are hedging, swap, or financial derivative agreements outstanding?
Are customer and supplier concentration risks material?
Do business/marketing plans align with strategic and financial goals?
Are internal operating policies documented and enforced?
Are customer satisfaction or churn reports available/reliable?
Are social media accounts and reputational assets secure and transferrable?
Are there pending/threatened claims that could materially impact the company?
Are directors/officers/shareholders personally involved in litigation?
Do settlements create ongoing obligations or indemnities?
Are disputes with suppliers/customers likely to escalate?
Do auditor letters highlight litigation or contingent liabilities?
Are licenses, permits, and consents valid and transferrable?
Are there material past or ongoing regulatory violations?
Are regulatory filings accurate, complete, and timely?
Is there an antitrust/competition compliance program in place?
Are regulatory consents required for change of control?
Are key employees under enforceable non-compete/confidentiality agreements?
Are compensation, equity, and benefit plans compliant and fully funded?
Are there outstanding labor disputes, claims, or investigations?
Are employee manuals/handbooks consistent with laws and practices?
Are harassment/misconduct policies enforced and documented?
Are privacy/security policies compliant with GDPR, CCPA, HIPAA, etc.?
Have there been breaches/incidents in the last 3 years, and were they managed properly?
Are SOC/ISO/PCI certifications current and verified?
Are cross-border data transfers legally compliant?
Are employee training and enforcement mechanisms effective?
Are environmental investigations, permits, or compliance issues outstanding?
Are workplace health, safety, and labor standards documented/enforced?
Are diversity/equity/inclusion policies implemented and monitored?
Are whistleblower/anti-corruption mechanisms functioning?
Are ESG metrics reported and tied to executive incentives?
